RelatedSentence: Officers from the British Transport Police and the Metropolitan Police attended the scene after the incident was reported at 1.28 pm .
A Greater Anglia spokesman confirmed the lines had reopened at 2.52 pm .
There are some alterations to the service , but generally it is running back to normal , the spokesman said .
